generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and a crosswalk, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, with pedestrians standing on it.
- building: A large building with windows and a modern architectural style is visible in the background.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are present along the roadside and near the building.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: Two people are standing on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: A dark-colored car is visible on the left side of the road, approaching the intersection.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and sign poles.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible on poles, including a "No Parking" sign and a "No Entry" sign.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on a pole near the intersection.
